S0150.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S0150.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR MAIN FLYING DUTY?  1. PILOT 2. CO-PILOT 3. NAVIGATOR - BOMBARDIER 4. RADIO OPERATOR 5. ENGINEER GUNNER 6. TAIL GUNNER (ARMORER) 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q2. GIVE THE APPROXIMATE DATE WHEN YOU FIRST WENT ON A COMBAT MISSION:  01. NOVEMBER 1943 OR EARLIER 02. DECEMBER 1943 03. JANUARY 1944 04. FEBRUARY 1944 05. MARCH 1944 06. APRIL 1944 07. MAY 1944 08. JUNE 1944 09. JULY 1-15, 1944 10. JULY 16-31, 1944 11. AUGUST 1944 00. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q3. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE?  01. CAPTAIN 02. 1ST LIEUTENANT 03. 2ND LIEUTENANT 04. FLIGHT OFFICER 05. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 06. STAFF SERGEANT 07. SERGEANT 08. MAJOR OR COLONEL 09. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 10. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 00. NO ANSWER
S0150.Q4. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  01. 18 YEARS OR LESS 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26 TO 29 YEARS 10. 30 YEARS OR OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q5. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH YOUR PRESENT ASSIGNMENT, AS COMPARED WITH OTHER TYPES OF COMBAT FLYING ASSIGNMENTS?  1. BETTER SATISFIED THAN I WOULD BE WITH ANY OTHER COMBAT FLYING ASSIGNMENT 2. AS WELL SATISFIED AS I WOULD BE WITH ANY OTHER 3. WOULD BE BETTER SATISFIED IN SOME OTHER TYPE OF COMBAT FLYING ASSIGNMENT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q6A. HOW MANY COMBAT MISSIONS HAVE YOU FLOWN UP TO NOW? (DO NOT COUNT MISSIONS ABORTED)  ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER MISSIONS) 01. 1 COMBAT MISSION COMPLETED . . . 99. 99 COMBAT MISSIONS COMPLETED 97.NONE 98.NO ANSWER
S0150.Q6B. HOW MANY COMBAT MISSIONS HAVE YOU COMPLETED IN THE PAST 30 DAYS?  ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER MISSIONS) 01. 1 COMBAT MISSION COMPLETED . . . 65. 65 COMBAT MISSIONS COMPLETED 97.NONE 98.NO ANSWER

S0150.Q7. IF YOU WERE DOING IT OVER AGAIN, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD CHOOSE TO SIGN UP FOR COMBAT FLYING?  1. YES, I'M PRETTY SURE I WOULD 2. YES, I THINK I WOULD, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD 4. NO, I'M SURE I WOULD NOT 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q8A. AS YOU SEE IT AT PRESENT, WOULD YOU WILLINGLY TAKE ON ANOTHER SERIES OF BOMBER MISSIONS IN THE ETO AFTER SPENDING A 30-DAY FURLOUGH IN THE U.S.A.*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q8B. AS YOU SEE IT AT PRESENT, WOULD YOU WILLINGLY TAKE ON ANOTHER SERIES OF BOMBER MISSIONS IN SOME OTHER THEATER AFTER SPENDING A 30-DAY FURLOUGH IN THE U.S.A.*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q9. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR TYPE OF OUTFIT WILL PLAY IN WINNING THE WAR?  1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART 2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART 3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q10. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE SEEN, HOW WELL DO YOU FEEL THAT HIGHER HEADQUARTERS (WING, DIVISION, 9TH AIR FORCE HQ) UNDER- STAND YOUR PROBLEMS AND NEEDS?  1. I FEEL THAT THEY ARE VERY MUCH AWARE OF OUR NEEDS 2. I FEEL THAT THEY ARE FAIRLY WELL AWARE OF OUR NEEDS 3. I FEEL THAT THEY DON'T KNOW VERY MUCH ABOUT OUR REAL PROBLEMS AND NEEDS 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 10A NOT CODED.

S0150.Q11A. ABOUT HOW MANY DAYS IN A ROW DO YOU THINK A MAN IN YOUR JOB CAN FLY ON COMBAT MISSIONS OF THE SORT YOU'VE BEEN ON AND KEEP HIS EFFICIENCY AT A REASONABLY HIGH LEVEL?  01. 1 DAY IN A ROW 02. 2 DAYS, "1 OR 2 DAYS" 03. 3 DAYS, "2 OR 3 DAYS" 04. 4 DAYS, "3 OR 4 DAYS" 05. 5 DAYS, "4 OR 5 DAYS" 06. 6 DAYS, "5 OR 6 DAYS" 07. 7 DAYS, "6 OR 7 DAYS" 08. 8 DAYS, "7 OR 8 DAYS" 09. 9 DAYS, "8 OR 9 DAYS" 10. MORE THAN 9 DAYS IN A ROW 00. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q11B. BEFORE BEING TAKEN OFF OPERATIONS FOR REST AND REHABILITATION ABOUT HOW MANY MISSIONS DO YOU THINK A MAN IN YOUR JOB CAN FLY AND KEEP HIS EFFICIENCY AT A REASONABLY HIGH LEVEL? (IN ANSWERING THINK OF MISSIONS OF THE SORT YOU YOURSELF HAVE BEEN ON)  ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER MISSIONS) 02. 2 MISSIONS . . . 99. 99 MISSIONS 97.QUESTION MISUNDERSTOOD 98.NO ANSWER 00.NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0150.Q12A. IN YOUR JUDGMENT, IS YOUR SHIP NOW BEING USED IN ANY KIND OF COMBAT ASSIGNMENTS FOR WHICH IT IS NOT WELL SUITED?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S0150.Q12B. ARE THERE ANY MODIFICATIONS WHICH YOU THINK WOULD IMPROVE THE COMBAT EFFICIENCY OF THE TYPE OF SHIP YOU ARE NOW USING?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q13. DO YOU THINK THAT YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY FOR A CAREER AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, I THINK I WILL WANT TO 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I'D WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q14. DO YOU THINK THAT YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY FOR A YEAR OR TWO AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, I THINK I WILL WANT TO 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I'D WANT TO 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q15. HOW MANY MISSIONS HAVE YOU BEEN ON IN THE PAST TEN DAYS? E. COMBAT MISSIONS IN PAST 10 DAYS:  01. ONE COMBAT MISSION 02. TWO 03. THREE 04. FOUR 05. FIVE 06. SIX 07. SEVEN 08. EIGHT 09. NINE 10. TEN OR MORE COMBAT MISSIONS 11. NONE 00. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q15A. ADDITIONAL CODING OF Q.15: E. TOTAL IN PAST 10 DAYS OF COMBAT MISSIONS PLUS MISSIONS CALLED BACK OR ABORTED.  01. ONE COMBAT MISSION 02. TWO 03. THREE 04. FOUR 05. FIVE 06. SIX 07. SEVEN 08. EIGHT 09. NINE 10. TEN OR MORE COMBAT MISSIONS 11. NONE 00. NO ANSWER TO ANY PART OF QUESTION 15 OR 15A

S0150.Q16A. WHAT IS THE GREATEST NUMBER OF DAYS IN A ROW THAT YOU HAVE FLOWN ON COMBAT MISSIONS?  01. ONE DAY IN A ROW 02. TWO 03. THREE 04. FOUR 05. FIVE 06. SIX 07. SEVEN 08. EIGHT 09. NINE 10. TEN OR MORE DAYS IN A ROW 11. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0150.Q16B. HOW MANY MISSIONS DID YOU FLY DURING THAT PERIOD?  01. ONE MISSION 02. TWO 03. THREE 04. FOUR 05. FIVE 06. SIX 07. SEVEN 08. EIGHT 09. NINE 10. TEN OR MORE MISSIONS 11. NO ANSWER
S0150.Q17. IS YOUR CREW ONE OF THE LEAD CREWS FOR YOUR SQUADRON OR GROUP?  1. YES, USUALLY 2. YES, ONCE IN A WHILE 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q18. IN YOUR OPINION ARE MOST OF THE COMBAT MISSIONS AT THE PRESENT TIME MORE DIFFICULT, ABOUT THE SAME, OR LESS DIFFICULT THAN THEY WERE AT ABOUT THE TIME WHEN YOU STARTED FLYING COMBAT MISSIONS IN ETO?  1. ON THE WHOLE THEY ARE LESS DIFFICULT NOW THAN THEY WERE 2. THEY ARE ABOUT THE SAME AS THEY WERE 3. ON THE WHOLE THEY ARE MORE DIFFICULT NOW THAN THEY WERE 4. HAVEN'T BEEN FLYING LONG ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q19. IN THE COMBAT MISSIONS YOU HAVE FLOWN, HAVE YOU EVER FELT THAT THE TARGET ASSIGNED WAS NOT AS IMPORTANT TO BOMB AS OTHER TARGETS THAT COULD HAVE BEEN SELECTED?  1. PRACTICALLY NEVER HAVE FELT THIS 2. HAVE FELT THIS OCCASIONALLY 3. HAVE FELT THIS QUITE OFTEN 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q20. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIME?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER
S0150.Q21. CONSIDERING EVERYTHING, HOW WOULD YOU RATE THE TRAINING YOU RECEIVED IN THE UNITED STATES?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q22. CONSIDERING EVERYTHING, HOW WOULD YOU RATE THE TRAINING YOU RECEIVED AT THE TRAINING CENTER IN ETO BEFORE GOING ON YOUR FIRST COMBAT MISSION?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 6. DID NOT GO TO A TRAINING CENTER IN ETO 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q23A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE PROMOTION POLICY FOR ENLISTED MEN IN COMBAT CREWS?  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. NOT VERY WELL SATISFIED 4. NOT SATISFIED AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0150.Q23B. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE PROMOTION POLICY FOR OFFICERS IN COMBAT CREWS?  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. NOT VERY WELL SATISFIED 4. NOT SATISFIED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q24. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU TO FLY YOUR MISSIONS WITH THE SAME CREW RATHER THAN WITH DIFFERENT CREWS?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. IMPORTANT 3. NOT VERY IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. DON'T KNOW 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q25D. CARE AND MAINTENANCE OF GUNS?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S0150.Q25E. GENERAL EXPERIENCE WITH FIGHTER TACTICS?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0150.Q25F. AIRCRAFT IDENTIFICATION?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S0150.Q25G. CROSS-COUNTRY NAVIGATION?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0150.Q26A. FORMATION FLYING IN GENERAL?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q26B. DEMONSTRATIONS AND PRACTICE IN FIRST AID?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0150.Q26C. PARACHUTE TRAINING AND DITCHING PROCEDURE?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S0150.Q26D. BOMBING PRACTICE?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0150.Q26E. NIGHT OR BLIND FLYING?  1. MORE THAN ENOUGH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 5. DOES NOT APPLY TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q26F. ARE THERE ANY PARTS OF THE TRAINING PROGRAM THAT YOU HAD WHICH YOU THINK COULD BE SHORTENED IN ORDER TO LEAVE MORE TIME FOR OTHER TRAINING?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q27A. BEFORE GOING ON YOUR FIRST COMBAT MISSION, ABOUT HOW MANY ROUNDS ALL TOLD HAD YOU ACTUALLY FIRED FROM .50 CAL. GUNS?  01. LESS THAN 100 ROUNDS 02. 100-499 03. 500-999 04. 1000-1999 05. 2000-2999 06. 3000-4999 07. 5000-6999 08. 7000-9999 09. 10,000 OR MORE ROUNDS 10. NONE 11. DON'T KNOW, NO ANSWER

BEFORE YOUR FIRST COMBAT MISSION, ABOUT HOW MANY HOURS HAD YOU FLOWN IN THE TYPE OF FORMATION YOU NOW USE IN COMBAT MISSIONS?  01. 1 TO 9 HOURS 02. 10 TO 19 03. 20 TO 29 04. 30 TO 39 05. 40 TO 49 06. 50 TO 59 07. 60 TO 74 08. 75 TO 99 09. 100 TO 149 10. 150 OR MORE HOURS 11. NONE 00. NO ANSWER

ONE LEAVE OR PASS 02. TWO 03. THREE 04. FOUR 05. FIVE 06. SIX 07. SEVEN, EIGHT OR NINE 08. TEN TO FOURTEEN 09. FIFTEEN OR MORE LEAVES OR PASSES 10. NONE 00. NO ANSWER E. FURLOUGHS SINCE BEGINNING COMBAT FLYING:

ONE FURLOUGH 76 02. TWO 20 03. THREE 6 04. FOUR 3 05. FIVE 1 06. SIX 6 07. SEVEN, EIGHT OR NINE 2 08. TEN TO FOURTEEN 2 09. FIFTEEN OR MORE FURLOUGHS 1272 10. NONE 48 00. NO ANSWER

THREE 04. FOUR 05. FIVE 06. SIX 07. SEVEN, EIGHT OR NINE 08. TEN TO FOURTEEN 09. FIFTEEN OR MORE LEAVES OR PASSES 10. NONE 00. NO ANSWER E. FURLOUGHS IN THE PAST FOUR WEEKS:

THREE 0 04. FOUR 1 05. FIVE 0 06. SIX 1 07. SEVEN, EIGHT OR NINE 1 08. TEN TO FOURTEEN 0 09. FIFTEEN OR MORE FURLOUGHS 1683 10. NONE 20 00. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q29. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE PRESENT PRACTICE IN YOUR OUTFIT WITH RESPECT TO THE GRANTING OF LEAVES AND PASSES?  1. IT IS AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. IT COULD BE SOMEWHAT BETTER 3. IT COULD BE A LOT BETTER 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 29A NOT CODED.

S0150.Q30A. DO YOU USUALLY KNOW AHEAD OF TIME WHEN YOU CAN COUNT ON HAVING A LEAVE OR PASS?  1. USUALLY KNOW A WEEK OR MORE BEFOREHAND 2. USUALLY GIVEN A FEW DAYS NOTICE 3. USUALLY FIND OUT ABOUT IT JUST BEFORE A LEAVE OR PASS IS GRANTED 4. I'M NOT SURE HOW IT WORKS 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2
S0150.CARD.  2. CARD TWO
S0150.DECK.  150. SURVEY NUMBER
S0150.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0150.Q30B. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU FEEL IT WOULD BE TO KNOW LONGER IN ADVANCE WHEN YOU ARE GOING TO GET PASSES OR LEAVES?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. IMPORTANT 3. NOT VERY IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. DON'T KNOW 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q31A. HAVE YOU SPENT ANY TIME IN A REST HOME? IF YES, HOW WELL SATISFIED WERE YOU WITH YOUR STAY AT THE REST HOME?  1. YES, VERY WELL SATISIFED 2. YES, PRETTY WELL SATISFIED 3. YES, NOT SO WELL SATISIFED 4. YES, NOT SATISFIED AT ALL 5. YES, NO ANSWER 6. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q31B. IF YOU WERE TO BE GIVEN SEVEN DAYS OFF AS A FURLOUGH AFTER A CERTAIN NUMBER OF MISSIONS, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD PREFER TO SPEND YOUR FURLOUGH TIME AT ONE OF THE AIR CORPS REST HOMES OR SOMEWHERE ELSE ON YOUR OWN?  1. WOULD RATHER SPEND IT AT ONE OF THE AIR CORPS REST HOMES 2. WOULD RATHER SPEND IT SOMEWHERE ELSE 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q32. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH PRESENT PRACTICES CON- CERNING THE GIVING OF AWARDS AND DECORATIONS TO MEMBERS OF COMBAT CREWS?  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. NOT VERY WELL SATISFIED 4. NOT SATISFIED AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 32A NOT CODED.

S0150.Q33. ARE THERE ANY ITEMS OF EQUIPMENT FOR USE ON MISSIONS WHICH YOU FEEL THE MEMBERS OF YOUR CREW NEED MORE OF THAN YOU NOW HAVE?  1. NO, WE HAVE ABOUT EVERYTHING WE NEED 2. YES, FEEL IT WOULD HELP A LITTLE IF WE HAD MORE OF SOME KINDS OF EQUIPMENT 3. YES, FEEL IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF WE HAD MORE OF SOME KINDS OF EQUIPMENT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 33A NOT CODED.

S0150.Q34A. ON THE AVERAGE, ABOUT HOW MANY HOURS SLEEP PER 24 HOUR DAY HAVE YOU HAD DURING THE LAST 10 DAYS?  1. ONE HOUR 2. TWO 3. THREE 4. FOUR 5. FIVE 6. SIX 7. SEVEN 8. EIGHT 9. MORE THAN EIGHT HOURS 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q34B. DO YOU EVER HAVE ANY DIFFICULTY IN SLEEPING WHEN YOU HAVE THE CHANCE?  1. ALMOST NEVER 2. OCCASIONALLY 3. FAIRLY OFTEN 4. VERY OFTEN 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 34C NOT CODED.

S0150.Q35. HAVE YOU HAD A FURLOUGH IN THE UNITED STATES SINCE YOU STARTED COMBAT FLYING? IF YES, HOW MANY COMBAT MISSIONS HAD YOU FLOWN BEFORE GOING BACK TO THE U.S. ON FURLOUGH?  01. YES, LESS THAN 30 COMBAT MISSIONS 02. YES, 30 TO 39 03. YES, 40 TO 49 04. YES, 50 TO 54 05. YES, 55 TO 59 06. YES, 60 TO 69 07. YES, 70 TO 79 08. YES, 80 OR MORE COMBAT MISSIONS 09. YES, NO ANSWER 10. NO 00. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q36A....THE MEDICAL SERVICE YOU ARE GETTING?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. COULD BE IMPROVED BUT IT WOULDN'T MAKE TOO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. COULD BE IMPROVED AND IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF IT WERE 4. UNCERTAIN 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q36B....THE RECREATIONAL FACILITIES AT YOUR BASE?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. COULD BE IMPROVED BUT IT WOULDN'T MAKE TOO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. COULD BE IMPROVED AND IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF IT WERE 4. UNCERTAIN 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q36C....THE FOOD AT YOUR BASE?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. COULD BE IMPROVED BUT IT WOULDN'T MAKE TOO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. COULD BE IMPROVED AND IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF IT WERE 4. UNCERTAIN 5. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q37. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE JOB "STARS AND STRIPES" IS DOING IN REPORTING THE OPERATIONS OF THE NINTH AIR FORCE?  1. A VERY GOOD JOB 2. A GOOD JOB 3. A FAIR JOB 4. A POOR JOB 5. A VERY POOR JOB 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q38A. OF THE TIMES WHEN YOU YOURSELF DID NOT FLY A COMBAT MISSION (BUT WERE NOT ON LEAVE OR PASS), HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU BEEN TOLD OF A "STAND DOWN" THE DAY BEFORE?  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. USUALLY NOT 5. PRACTICALLY NEVER 6. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q38B. IN YOUR OPINION, IS THIS ABOUT AS OFTEN AS IT IS POSSIBLE TO TELL YOU IN ADVANCE, OR DO YOU FEEL IT WOULD BE POSSIBLE TO TELL YOU MORE OFTEN?  1. WE ARE TOLD ABOUT AS OFTEN AS IT IS POSSIBLE 2. FEEL IT WOULD BE POSSIBLE TO TELL US SOMEWHAT MORE OFTEN 3. FEEL IT WOULD BE POSSIBLE TO TELL US A LOT MORE OFTEN 4. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0150.Q39A. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE BEEN GIVEN AS MUCH INFORMATION AS YOU WOULD LIKE TO HAVE ABOUT THE KIND OF ASSIGNMENTS MEN CAN GET AT THAT TIME?  1. YES, I FEEL I HAVE BEEN GIVEN ENOUGH INFORMATION ABOUT THIS 2. NO, I WISH I HAD MORE INFORMATION ABOUT THIS 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q39B. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE PRESENT POLICY REGARDING ASSIGNMENT OF MEN AT THAT TIME?  1. I THINK THE POLICY IS ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT CAN BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. I THINK THE POLICY OUGHT TO BE IMPROVED 3. I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE POLICY OF ASSIGNMENT IS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q39C. CONSIDERING WHAT YOU PERSONALLY CAN CONTRIBUTE TO THE WAR EFFORT, WHAT KIND OF AN ARMY ASSIGNMENT DO YOU THINK YOU OUGHT TO HAVE AT THAT TIME?  01. INSTRUCTOR - IN THE U.S. 02. INSTRUCTOR - LOCALE UNSPECIFIED OR NOT IN U.S. (MAY BE PHRASED AS "TRAINING NEW CREWS" OR "HELP IN THE TRAINING PROGRAM" OR ETC.) 03. JOB IN U.S. - UNSPECIFIED AS TO WHAT 04. ATC JOB (AIR TRANSPORT COMMAND) 05. FERRY COMMAND JOB 06. OTHER GROUND JOB (OTHER THAN INSTRUCTOR) 07. A COMBAT FLYING JOB, IN ANOTHER THEATER (SOME MAY STATE IT AS "CONTINUE WITH PRESENT ASSIGNMENT IN ANOTHER THEATER" OR ETC.) 08. A COMBAT FLYING JOB, DOESN'T SPECIFY ANOTHER THEATER (SOME MAY STATE "MY PRESENT ASSIGNMENT" OR "SAME JOB I HAVE NOW" OR ETC.) 09. GO TO SCHOOL (TO GET TRAINING FOR SOME OTHER AIR FORCE JOB) 10. MISCELLANEOUS AND UNCLASSIFIABLE 00. DON'T KNOW, UNDECIDED, NO ANSWER P. YOUR ANSWERS TO THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS WILL PROVIDE IMPORTANT INFORMATION THAT WILL HELP THE ARMY IN KNOWING WHAT PLANS TO MAKE FOR AFTER THE WAR.

S0150.Q40. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE HAD AS MUCH SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AS YOU WANT, OR WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. I HAVE HAD AS MUCH SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AS I WANT 2. I WOULD LIKE TO GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 3. I WOULD LIKE TO GO BACK TO PART-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q41. HOW MUCH EDUCATION HAVE YOU HAD?  1. LESS THAN 8TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 7. GRADUATE STUDY IN COLLEGE OR UNIVERSITY 8. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA I. IF YOU ARE AN OFFICER, PLEASE ANSWER QUESTIONS 42-54; - IF YOU ARE AN ENLISTED MAN, PLEASE SKIP QUESTIONS 42-54 AND TURN TO QUESTION 55:

S0150.Q42. IF YOU COULD KEEP YOUR COMMISSION AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO MAKE A CAREER OF THE ARMY?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0150.Q43. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY, AS AN OFFICER, FOR A YEAR OR TWO AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I'D WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0150.Q44. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY AS AN OFFICER AFTER THE WAR EVEN IF YOU HAD TO ACCEPT A LOWER GRADE THAN YOU NOW HOLD?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER
S0150.Q44A. WHAT IS THE LOWEST GRADE YOU WOULD BE WILLING TO ACCEPT?  1. LIEUTENANT COLONEL 2. MAJOR 3. CAPTAIN 4. 1ST LIEUTENANT 5. 2ND LIEUTENANT 6. FLIGHT OFFICER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

I WOULD PROBABLY APPLY EVEN IF I COULD NOT GET A LEAVE IN THE UNITED STATES BEFORE REPORTING ON MY NEW ASSIGNMENT 2.
